message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you. I'm asking for $18,000 to start. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $18,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Can you meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  $18,000 is a strong starting point considering the value this product brings. To find a middle ground, I can come down to $15,000.  What do you say?

I appreciate your willingness to come down to $15,000, but I'm still a bit short. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $9,000 for the product. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
